description: Deletion record for deleting a library's contributions to an Instance in a shared index

institutionId.description: UUID representing the institution who's contributions to a shared Instance should be removed

localIdentifier.description: A library's legacy identifier for a bibliographic record that is to be removed from a shared Instance

oaiIdentifier.description: The record identifier of an OAI-PMH feed, for a bibliographic record that is to be removed from a shared Instance

identifierTypeId.description: ID for the identifier type attached to all identifier values from the institution who's contributions to a shared Instance should be removed
